reviews.text: Reviews are automatically processed to detect inappropriate content like fake reviews and spam. We may take down reviews that are flagged in order to comply with Google policies or legal obligations.
"He answered EVERY question I had before he started." "Great at what he does, always an excellent job done"

Michael did a great job. He is eager to please, and make your inspiration a reality. I received estimates from 5 other companies which offered cookie cutter patios, but none offered what I wanted. He expended a great deal of effort … More

What can I say about this man. Omg he did an awesome job on building me a patio cover..Michael came on time every day, the price was great,  he was sooo nice and professional. I hope his business grows and grows...I am so pleased. You won't … More
Michael does amazing work!  Everything he does is precise and exactly what I asked for.  Ethical and dependable!
